backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing recipe management, ingredient costing, production tracking, raw materials CRUD, and dashboard statistics with admin authentication and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds isInitialized field to actor state, defaulting to false for backward compatibility.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting frontend error handling improvements for canister stopped errors across multiple components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, authentication, recipe management, cost analysis, production calculator, and raw material master features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Jeevanam Smart Kitchen Calculator application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with protected routes, authentication guards, theme provider, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/CostAnalysis.tsx: Cost analysis component with recipe selection, ingredient breakdown table that applies proper unit conversion (g→kg, ml→L) for accurate cost calculations, and profit margin calculator.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSummary: Dashboard summary displaying four metric cards (total recipes, ingredients, most produced item, average food cost percentage) with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/IngredientCostFo: Manages ingredient cost data with inline editing, allowing users to set/update costs per unit for all ingredients extracted from recipes, with localStorage persistence and mutation hooks for backend sync.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component providing header with branding, responsive navigation (desktop/mobile sheet), and footer with attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation component rendering menu items (Dashboard, Recipe Master, Raw Material Master, Calculator, Cost Control) with active state highlighting and logout functionality, supporting both desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/ProductionCalcul: Production calculator form allowing users to select category/recipe and quantity, then calculates required ingredients with unit conversion (g→kg, ml→L) and displays results in a table.
frontend/src/components/ProductionHistor: Displays today's production history in a table showing time, recipe name, quantity, and cost, with loading skeleton and empty state handling.
Form for adding/editing raw materials with name, unit type, and price fields, including duplicate validation, canister error handling with retry logic, and mutation hooks for backend operations.
frontend/src/components/RawMaterialTable: Displays a table of raw materials with edit and delete actions, including loading states, error handling for canister stopped errors, and confirmation dialogs for deletion.
frontend/src/components/RecipeList.tsx: Renders a list of recipes in a table format showing name, category, portion weight, and ingredient count with edit and delete actions, including empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/RecipeMasterForm: Form component for creating and editing recipes with fields for name, category, portion weight, and dynamic ingredient list that maps to raw materials from the backend.
frontend/src/components/StoreIssueSlip.t: Generates and displays a store issue slip for a recipe showing required ingredients with quantities, includes print and PDF download functionality with automatic unit conversion (g to kg, ml to L).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing auth client creation, identity state, and login status throughout the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for recipes, raw materials, production records, and dashboard stats with localStorage-based production history. Includes error handling utilities for canister stopped errors and user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a warm color palette (terracotta, sage green, cream) in light and dark modes, plus print styles for store issue slips.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CostControl.tsx: Page component that displays the CostAnalysis component for recipe cost calculation and profit margin analysis.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing production summary statistics and production history with date display.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity authentication with automatic admin setup, retry logic for canister stopped errors, and user-friendly error messages.
Page component that renders the ProductionCalculator and conditionally displays a StoreIssueSlip based on calculation results.
frontend/src/pages/RawMaterialMaster.tsx: Page for managing raw materials with add/edit forms, a data table, and global error handling for service unavailability.
frontend/src/pages/RecipeMaster.tsx: Page for creating and managing recipes with a list view, edit functionality, and a toggle between list and form views.
frontend/src/utils/dashboardCalculations: Utility functions for calculating total ingredient consumption, finding top ingredients, and computing total production costs from production records.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates printable HTML content for store issue slips with ingredient lists, signatures, and formatted production details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended typography and animation plugins, custom font families (Inter, Poppins), and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file indicating a fix request for a canister stopped error that prevents raw material operations, with two pending action requests for investigation and backend initialization improvements.
